snippet.title: Destiny 2: Forsaken Annual Pass – Black Armory Gofannon Forge Trailer
snippet.description:
The Gofannon Forge has emerged along with a new threat, Siviks. Battle his forces and forge powerful new Black Armory weapons. Be sure to gather your fireteam because the new Raid, Scourge of the Past, is open. Black Armory will be delivered over December 4th to March 4th. 
 
Buy the Annual Pass now at https://www.destinythegame.com/buy.

FOLLOW DESTINY:

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
